attributes.action: yield power to Her Majesty the Queen, Sovereign of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the inability of Parliament to conduct themselves in an honest and professional manner, we demand that Parliament be dissolved and the Queen be placed in power until such time that a revised and corruption free parliament can be conducted. Parliament & the current government represents a clear and present danger to the United Kingdom.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
